src:
Bupati Bogor Belum Terima Laporan soal Pasar Citeureup yang Semrawut
05 Nov 2019, 13:04 by Sachril Agustin Berutu
Bogor - Banyaknya pedagang kaki lima (PKL) yang berjualan di pinggir jalan membuat Pasar Citeureup, Kabupaten Bogor, semrawut. Bupati Bogor Ade Yasin menegaskan belum dapat laporan soal semrawutnya Pasar Citeureup.
"Selama ini belum ada laporan ke kami lagi. Kalau kira-kira meresahkan, kita akan tindak lanjuti," kata Ade seusai acara Gebyar Temu 1001 UMKM Dalam Rangka Motivasi Bisnis dan Festival Olahan Singkong, di Gedung Tegar Beriman, Cibinong, Kabupaten Bogor, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Saat ditantang apakah dia berani menertibkan pasar tersebut, Ade menyanggupinya. Menurutnya, penataan wilayah adalah tugasnya.
"Berani, masa enggak berani sih (tertibkan PKL). Namanya penataan wilayah masa enggak berani," tuturnya.
text:
Bogor Regent Has Not Received Reports about the chaotic Citeureup Market
05 Nov 2019, 13:04 by Sachril Agustin Berutu
Bogor - The number of street vendors (PKL) who sell on the side of the road to make Citeureup Market, Bogor Regency, chaotic. Bogor Regent Ade Yasin stressed that he had not been able to report the chaotic Citeureup Market.
"So far there has been no report to us anymore. If it is about disturbing, we will follow up," Ade said after the 1001 UMKM Gebyar Meeting In the Context of Cassava Processed Business Motivation and Festival, in Tegar Beriman Building, Cibinong, Bogor Regency, Tuesday (11/5/2019).
When challenged whether he dared to bring order to the market, Ade agreed. According to him, the arrangement of territories is his duty.
"How dare you, how dare you not (orderly street vendors). It's called the regional arrangement of the courageous period," he said.
